title: Kate Spade | Saturday
content:
Trying to figure out what font is used on the menu bar for the new Kate Spade Saturday site. Any ideas?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Screen Shot 2013-06-27 at 2.23.18 PM.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150105201917/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202013-06-27%20at%202.23.18%20PM.png) | 16.59 KB |
author: missblaser

comments.content: Looks like Neutraface by House Industries.
Not the actual logo, but the menu "new! clothing accessories..."
